spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant deviations in room placement and proportions. Balconies differ significantly from floor plan. Missing windows and incorrect door placements.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are simplified and sometimes missing entirely. Several doors are missing. Adjacency relationships are mostly correct but compromised by missing elements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement deviates significantly in many rooms. Some furniture is missing or has incorrect scaling/type.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera angle and projection are good. Lighting is decent. Geometry is clean, but the render's simplification of architectural features degrades overall clarity compared to the detailed floor plan.

detected_errors.description: Missing two windows in the top-left room (bedroom 1).
Missing one window in the room next to bedroom 1 (study/office).
Missing window in the top-right bedroom.
Missing window in the bathroom next to the top-right bedroom.
Missing door between the kitchen and the living room.
Missing door to the bathroom on the right side.
Missing door to the bedroom on the bottom-right.
Door leading to the top-left bedroom is misplaced and facing outwards, rather than inwards into the hallway.
Door leading to the top-right bedroom is misplaced compared to the floor plan.
Door leading to the bathroom adjacent to the top-right bedroom is misplaced.
Orientation of the door to the top-left bedroom is incorrect.
The balcony on the top-left differs significantly in shape and size from the floor plan.
The balcony on the bottom-left is significantly altered in shape and proportions.
The balcony on the right side is simplified and differs in proportion and structure.
Proportions of the living room (center) appear slightly distorted, specifically width.
Proportions of the kitchen area are slightly altered.
Several internal walls in the render are simplified or missing compared to the floor plan, leading to open spaces not present in the original.
The exterior wall surrounding the bottom-left balcony is significantly different and potentially hallucinated from the floor plan's depiction.
Furniture placement in the top-left bedroom is incorrect: bed is horizontal in render, vertical in plan.
Missing a sofa in the top-left balcony area.
Furniture in the top-right balcony area is different and misarranged.
The dining table in the central dining area is larger and differently shaped than depicted in the floor plan.
Missing a small table in the central living area.
Furniture arrangement in the bottom-right bedroom is entirely different.
Missing doors to the two small storage/closet areas near the bathroom on the right.
